name: Foundation: Icon Scaler
description:
Deliver Icons at a greater speed!


Foundation: Icon Scaler is a plugin that helps you and your team to optimize the icon creation workflow.


Create your base icon and scale to the other desired sizes in one single click with rules defined by you.


Settings can be shared and imported so you don't have to create them manually every time you run the plugin for the first time.


Features

Main features:

  • Component set generator
  • Flatten Icon Shapes
  • Crop Component Sets
  • Outline Stroke
  • Import and Export Settings
  • Bulk Icon creation
  • Lock layers and add background for better deep selection
